comments:
On gtk.linux.x86_64, using 64bit 1.5.0_09 vm from solaris, the JNI launcher fails with the below stack trace.  This occurs during construction of the Main class while trying to extract the manifest from the equinox.launcher jar.

The workaround for now is to copy equinox.launcher into the root as startup.jar and use an old launcher to start eclipse in a separate java process. The launcher library is loaded correctly and the new splash screen works.

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.InternalError
        at java.util.zip.Inflater.init(Native Method)
        at java.util.zip.Inflater.<init>(Inflater.java:75)

        at java.util.zip.ZipFile.getInputStream(ZipFile.java:286)
        at java.util.jar.JarFile.hasClassPathAttribute(JarFile.java:467)
        at java.util.jar.JavaUtilJarAccessImpl.jarFileHasClassPathAttribute(JavaUtilJarAccessImpl.java:15)
        at sun.misc.URLClassPath$JarLoader.getClassPath(URLClassPath.java:809)
        at sun.misc.URLClassPath.getLoader(URLClassPath.java:293)
        at sun.misc.URLClassPath.getResource(URLClassPath.java:160)
        at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:192)
        at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
        at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:188)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:306)
        at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:268)

        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(ClassLoader.java:319)
*** glibc detected *** double free or corruption (fasttop): 0x0000000000504130 ***
Aborted

Should this be failing for me with 3.3M4?
Not M4, but builds I20061219-0800 or newer

as with the ppc, this works better when using a recent vm, ie IBM's 
IBM J9SE VM (build 2.2, J2RE 1.4.2 IBM J9 2.2 Linux amd64-64 j9xa64142-20061124 
works.
Changing summary to be consistent with other [launcher] bugs.

The latest VM that we are able to get here is 5.0 Update 3.

Andrew-IBM is there anything we can do here or maybe something that someone in the community (Andrew-Redhat?) can try?
